lyrics: 雨は夜更け過ぎに雪へと変わるだろうSilent night, Holy nightきっと君は来ないひとりきりのクリスマス・イブSilent night, Holy night心深く 秘めた想い叶えられそうもない必ず今夜なら言えそうな気がしたSilent night, Holy nightまだ消え残る 君への想い夜へと降り続く街角にはクリスマス・トゥリー銀色のきらめきSilent night, Holy night
translated_lyrics: ♫ Rain will change into snow ♫ ♫ Silent night, Holy Night, ♫ ♫ You won't come Christmas Eve. ♫ ♫ Silent night, Holy Night ♫ ♫ Silent night ♫ ♫ Silent night ♫ ♫ Holy night, ♫ ♫ I'm still going to the night ♫ ♫ to the night of my love for you ♫ ♫ on the street corner ♫ ♫ Silent. ♫ ♫ Silent night ♫ Holy night
